title: Card schema.
description: This schema represents a single card in Star Wars: The Card Game LCG from Fantasy Flight Games.

fieldMetric.title: A field metric contains statistics for the field (i.e. cost, damageCapacity, forceIcons).
fieldMetric.description: The field metric is used in the entire objective stats and by card type stats.

count.title: The count of cards that have the field defined.

total.title: The sum of the field value for all cards.

average.title: The average of the field value for all cards based on field count.

max.title: The maximum field value for all cards.

min.title: The minimum field value for all cards.

product.title: The name of the product the card was released with.
product.description: The product matches the name of the core set or any Force Pack or Deluxe Expansion (e.g. A Dark Time, Core Set, Edge of Darkness)

productCycle.title: The name of the cycle for the product.

productOctgnId.title: The OCTGN GUID for the specified product.

octgnId.title: The OCTGN GUID for the card.

objectiveSetNumber.title: The objective set number the card is assigned to.

objectiveSetSequence.title: The sequential number of the card in the objective set.

side.title: The side of the Force the card is assigned to.

affiliation.title: The side of the Force affiliation.
affiliation.description: Each side of the Force recruits its allies from three different affiliations (for a total of six affiliations).

affiliationLock.title: The affiliation the card is restricted to.
affiliationLock.description: The affiliation lock is only applied to the Objective card for an objective set.

type.title: The type of card.
type.description: An objective setâ€™s five other cards are a combination of Unit, Event, Fate, or Enhancement cards (some objective sets include multiple copies of the same card).

isUnique.title: Flag if the card is unique.
isUnique.description: Some cards feature the diamond symbol before their card title. This indicates the character, location, or equipment represented by the card is Unique.

isLimitedToObjectiveDeck.title: Flag if the card is limited to only one per objective deck.
isLimitedToObjectiveDeck.description: The limited to an objective deck is only applied to the Objective card for an objective set.

cost.title: The resource cost to play the card.

damageCapacity.title: The amount of damage that can be dealt before the card is destroyed.
damageCapacity.description: When a card has a number of damage tokens with value equal to or greater than its damage capacity, it is immediately destroyed. Damage in excess of its damage capacity is ignored.

forceIcons.title: The amount of force the card has.

resourceValue.title: The amount of resources the card can generate.
resourceValue.description: A ready card with a resource value can generate resources up to that value to help pay a resource cost.

edgePriorityNumber.title: The priority in which the Fate card is resolved during an edge battle.
edgePriorityNumber.description: In ascending order (from lowest to highest) of priority number, each player resolves the effects of fate cards placed in his edge stack.

normalCombatIcons.title: Object with the values for normal combat icons.

unitDamage.title: The amount of damage to deal to a participating enemy unit.

blastDamage.title: The amount of damage to deal to the engaged enemy objective.

tactics.title: The amount of focus to deal to any enemy unit.

edgeEnabledCombatIcons.title: Object with the values for edge-enabled combat icons.

unitDamage.title: The amount of damage to deal to a participating enemy unit.

blastDamage.title: The amount of damage to deal to the engaged enemy objective.

tactics.title: The amount of focus to deal to any enemy unit.

abilities.title: Object that defines the abilities and effects of the card.

traits.title: The trait(s) (i.e. attribute(s)) for the card.
traits.description: A trait (always represented at the top of the text box and printed in italics) has no inherent effect. Instead, a trait grants its card an attribute that may be referenced by other effects.

referencedTraits.title: The trait(s) found in the text of the card.

keywords.title: An array of objects containing the keyword(s) for the card and parsed fields for each keyword.
keywords.description: Unlike a trait, which has no inherent abilities, a keyword is an attribute which conveys specific rules to its card.

forceIcons.title: The number of force icons added by the Edge keyword.

text.title: The keyword text that follows the keyword. This is either reminder text or text that defines abilities based on the keyword.

cost.title: The resource cost to play the card as a Pilot.

text.title: The keyword text that follows the keyword. This is either reminder text or text that defines abilities based on the keyword.

trait.title: The targeted trait for the Protect keyword.

text.title: The keyword text that follows the keyword. This is either reminder text or text that defines abilities based on the keyword.
The keyword text that follows the keyword. This is either reminder text or text that defines abilities based on the keyword.

actions.title: The default action(s) parsed from the card text for the card.
actions.description: This list is parsed from the card text for each "Action:" found.

forcedActions.title: The default forced action(s) parsed from the card text for the card.
forcedActions.description: This list is parsed from the card text for each "Forced Action:" found.

reactions.title: The default reaction(s) parsed from the card text for the card.
reactions.description: This list is parsed from the card text for each "Reaction:" found.

forcedReactions.title: The default forced reaction(s) parsed from the card text for the card.
forcedReactions.description: This list is parsed from the card text for each "Forced Reaction:" found.

interrupts.title: The default interrupt(s) parsed from the card text for the card.
interrupts.description: This list is parsed from the card text for each "Interrupt:" found.

forcedInterrupts.title: The default forced interrupt(s) parsed from the card text for the card.
forcedInterrupts.description: This list is parsed from the card text for each "Forced Interrupt:" found.

scenarios.title: Custom scenarios parsed from the card text.

illustrator.title: The illustrator for the card's artwork.

stats.title: An object that is added only to Objective cards that contains stats for the objective and by card type.

objective.title: Stats for the entire objective set.

type.title: Stats by card type in the objective set.
